data.name: WP9 2022 世界への飛翔 購入権セット 全４頭
data.detailed_description: It is a set that you can purchase the four famous horses of Taiki Shuttle, El Condor Pasa, Lord Kanaloa, and Maurice, that showed the strength of Japan to the world by winning overseas GI races.
data.about_the_game: It is a set that you can purchase the four famous horses of Taiki Shuttle, El Condor Pasa, Lord Kanaloa, and Maurice, that showed the strength of Japan to the world by winning overseas GI races.
data.short_description: It is a set that you can purchase the four famous horses of Taiki Shuttle, El Condor Pasa, Lord Kanaloa, and Maurice, that showed the strength of Japan to the world by winning overseas GI races.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 11 Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 各日本語64bit版
  • Processor: ■Windows8.1/10：Intel Core i3-4170 以上　■Windows11：Intel Core i3-8350K 以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ■Windows8.1/10：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti (1GB)以上、AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB)以上、1280×720　■Windows11：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)以上、AMD Radeon R7 360 (2GB)以上、1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
  • Additional Notes: ※1280 x 720ピクセル以上表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、メモリのシステム要件は4GB RAM、DirectX バージョンは12です。

Recommended:

  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
